entry.title: Purpose
entry.content:
01

The purpose of this personal website is to record some technical problems I have encountered, share my experience, and leave traces of my existence in the world, that’s it.

02

The major contents of the blog are documented as follows.

  • Site configuration
  • Experience in studying abroad
  • Algorithm problems
  • Mini-games(just for fun)
  • Some tutorials（like build this blog）

03

I will update this blog when I get some new ideas~
